sentences.en: 20 to 40 per cent of the voters are undecided.
After college she was still undecided as to what career she wanted to pursue.
sentences.cn: 大学毕业后她仍无法决定自己要追求什么事业。

sentences.en: After university she was still undecided as to what career she wanted to pursue.
sentences.cn: 大学毕业后她仍决定不下来要从事什么职业。

sentences.en: Days elapsed while I remained undecided.
sentences.cn: 好几天已过去了,而我仍然犹豫不决.

sentences.en: He had taken two or three undecided turns up and down while uttering these broken sentences.
sentences.cn: 他断断续续地说出这些话,不知所措地来回踱了两三个圈子.

sentences.en: He is still undecided about what to do.
sentences.cn: 他仍然未决定要做什么.

sentences.en: His message was aimed at the undecided middle ground of Israeli politics.
sentences.cn: 他所传达的信息针对的是以色列政局中尚未表态的中间派。

sentences.en: Most of its issues are still undecided among Christians to this day.
sentences.cn: 在基督徒中至今大部分争论之点仍未有定论.

sentences.en: Of the 59 committee members, 40 were against legalisation, 13 were in favour and the remainder were undecided.
sentences.cn: 在59个委员会委员中，有40人反对这项法案,13人赞成，其余的尚未表明态度。

sentences.en: She was undecided ( about ) whether she should accept his offer.
sentences.cn: 她拿不定主意应该不应该接受他的好意.

sentences.en: She was undecided when she would go there.
sentences.cn: 她尚未决定什么时候去那里.

sentences.en: The date of departure remains undecided.

sentences.cn: 这个问题仍然悬而未决.

sentences.en: The noes have 50 percent, the yeses 35 percent and the rest are undecided.
sentences.cn: 反对者占50%，赞成者占35%，其余人尚未决定。

sentences.en: The suit , undecided, has fallen into rack, and ruin, and despair.
sentences.cn: 这场打不完的官司只是招来了痛苦, 破产和绝望.

sentences.en: Within a block he halted, undecided.
sentences.cn: 在离开那里一条横马路的地方,他停住脚, 犹豫起来.

trans.tran_cn: 未解决，未确定，（天气等）不稳定的，犹豫不定
trans.tran_en: not having made a decision about something important
